name: Asociación de Centros de Transporte de España
goal: Asociación profesional representativa de centros de transporte y plataformas logísticas en España.
interests: Education and training, Environment, International co-operation and development, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: - Our inscription in the Transparency Register refers to the possible membership of THE GROUP OF EXPERTS ON SAFE AND SECURE PARKING AREAS FOR TRUCKS. Therefore, as an applicant it is not necessary to register our organization in the Transparency Register. Now, our registration will be made once the selection process is finished and we are appointed as a member of type C.
